title: Yung Lean Announces Release Date for New Album Jonatan, Shares Video: Watch
description: The Swedish artist’s “Forever Yung” arrives with a music video directed by Aidan Zamiri

text: The Swedish artist’s “Forever Yung” arrives with a music video directed by Aidan ZamiriYung Lean has shared the first taste of his new album Jonatan. The Swedish artist’s new single, “Forever Yung,” arrives with a music video directed by Aidan Zamiri. The visual features appearances from Lean’s Sad Boys compadres Yung Sherman and Gud. Watch it below; scroll down for the Jonatan artwork.Jonatan is out on May 2 via World Affairs. The album is the Swede’s first solo effort under the Yung Lean moniker since 2022’s Stardust. The musician born Jonatan Aron Leandoer Håstad has more recently adopted the name Jonatan Leandoer96 for 2023’s Sugar World, and made collaborative albums with Gud (Död Mark 4Evigt) and Bladee (Psykos).Read about Yung Lean in Jayson Greene’s “The Rise of Dissociation Music.”Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. html:
The Swedish artist’s “Forever Yung” arrives with a music video directed by Aidan Zamiri

Yung Lean has shared the first taste of his new album Jonatan. The Swedish artist’s new single, “Forever Yung,” arrives with a music video directed by Aidan Zamiri. The visual features appearances from Lean’s Sad Boys compadres Yung Sherman and Gud. Watch it below; scroll down for the Jonatan artwork.

Jonatan is out on May 2 via World Affairs. The album is the Swede’s first solo effort under the Yung Lean moniker since 2022’s Stardust. The musician born Jonatan Aron Leandoer Håstad has more recently adopted the name Jonatan Leandoer96 for 2023’s Sugar World, and made collaborative albums with Gud (Död Mark 4Evigt) and Bladee (Psykos).

Read about Yung Lean in Jayson Greene’s “The Rise of Dissociation Music.”

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read more
